name: 2.Objective & Methodologies
content:
Objective and Methodologies

Objective

Forecast cash flows by aggregating and analyzing various transactional data like sales revenue, expense, outlays, development costs, investments


Cash flow Calculation Formula:

Cash Flow for every sale_date_month = Sum(Selling_Price) - Sum(Development_Cost) + Sum(Payment_Due_Amount) - Sum(Investment_Amount) - Sum(Expense) + Sum(Amount_Due) + Sum(Equity_Amount) + Sum(Asset_Amount) â€“ Sum(Liability_Amount)


Method:

We have to calculate cash-flow for each organisation based on above formula.

  1. For each organisation we have to calculate month wise total sales, development cost, payment due, investment amount, expenses, equity value, asset value and liability value.
  2. Calculate cash flow using above formula.
  3. Prophet and Sarimax model are used for training
  4. Forecast the future cash flow.
